author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Sunnyvale, CA is looking for best practices for reviewing and evaluating RFPs.  Any information, documentation, etc that you can share by Monday, 9/27 would be very helpful and appreciated!  
Thanks,  
Yvette  
Yvette A. Blackford  
Intergovernmental Relations Officer  
City of Sunnyvale  
Sunnyvale, CA  94086  
408-730-7536  
Yvette Blackford (yblackford@ci.sunnyvale.ca.us)
title: Reviewing/Evaluating RFPs - Best Practices
